original_text: Our Christian friends, remember how we worked so hard to help you. We worked during the day and even during the night. We did not want to cause any problems for you. So we taught you God's good news and we did not ask you to give us anything in return.
korean_text: 형제들아 우리의 수고와 애쓴 것을 너희가 기억하리니 너희 아무에게도 폐를 끼치지 아니하려고 밤낮으로 일하면서 너희에게 하나님의 복음을 전하였노라

sentences.original_text: how we worked so hard to help you
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 당신을 돕기 위해 얼마나 열심히 일했는지

sentences.original_text: We did not want to cause any problems for you
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 당신에게 어떤 문제도 일으키고 싶지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: So we taught you God's good news
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 우리는 당신에게 하나님의 복음을 가르쳤고

sentences.original_text: and we did not ask you to give us anything in return
sentences.korean_translation: 당신에게 보답으로 무엇을 주라고 요구하지 않았습니다
